channel.title: Census on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Census on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: 2010 Michigan census data
item.description: Census data for Michigan from the 2010 census will be used for reapportionment. When the data is available, this chart will show it. The release date was at 2:00 p.m. on March 22, 2011. IFRAMES not supported More, much more, when it actually shows up; from census.gov. News releases From the Census, U.S. Census Bureau Delivers Michigan's 2010 Census Population Totals, Including First Look at Race and Hispanic Origin Data for Legislative Redistricting (cb11-cn106, 3/22/11).
